name: Lentil Smashburger Taco
recipeIngredient: 0.25 red bell pepper red bell pepper
0.25 red bell pepper red bell pepper

recipeInstructions.name: Step 1
recipeInstructions.text: Add onion, red bell pepper, and white mushrooms to a food processor and pulse until roughly chopped and around the same size. Saut√© this mixture in a pan over medium heat until most of the moisture has cooked out (optionally sprinkle salt to draw out more water). Remove from pan and set aside.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 2
recipeInstructions.text: In a small food processor add gluten-free oats and salt, pepper, smoked paprika, dried thyme, garlic powder, onion powder, and nutritional yeast and blend until roughly combined. Then in a large bowl add lentils, onion, red bell pepper, white mushrooms, the blended oats and ketchup and mash to form the patty mix and it holds shape.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 3
recipeInstructions.text: Take tortillas and shape the patty mix into two rounds on them. Cook patty side down in a pan for 3 minutes|5%minutes, optionally add a weight on top to keep them flat. Flip after 3 minutes|5%minutes, add vegan cheese and steam to melt.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl bowl mix together burger sauce: vegan mayo, ketchup, mustard, sweet relish, and lemon juice.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
recipeInstructions.text: Assemble with toppings of choice and enjoy.
